actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President actively seek an international convention which has as its goal a multilateral treaty to deny sanctuary to international terrorists.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President actively seek an international convention which has as its goal a multilateral treaty to deny sanctuary to international terrorists.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President actively seek an international convention which has as its goal a multilateral treaty to deny sanctuary to international terrorists.
